document.masterDocTitle: A catalog of Athericidae (Diptera) from Neotropical and Andean Regions

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Trichopalpus obscurus
Philippi, 1865: 725
Syntypes: Valdivia province (without precise locality; no type specimen deposited in MNNC, presumably lost). Refs.
Espinoza, 1917: 77
;
Delfin, 1901: 77
.

=
Dasyomma coeruleum
[ sic !] var. impressifrons
Malloch, 1932a: 222
. Holotype : female, Castro, Chiloe I., 20- 22.xi.1926 , F. & M. Edwards (NHMUK). Refs.:
James, 1968: 5
(list, possible syn.);
Coscarón & Coscarón, 1995: 78
(syn.).

subSubSection.paragraph: Dist.: Chile . Región del Maule : Cauquenes Province (Paso García ( 22 km NW Cauquenes), La Arboleda, Tregualemu); Región de Ñuble: Diguillín Province (Las Trancas); Región de La Araucanía : Malleco Province (Angol, PN Nahuelbuta, PN Tolhuaca, Termas Río Blanco, Vegas Blancas); Cautín Province (Fundo Chacano (Nueva Imperial), Fundo La Selva (Nueva Imperial, Loncoche); Región de los Ríos : Valdivia Province (Alto Mafil, Hueicolla, MN Alerce Costero); Región de Los Lagos : Osorno Province (Aguas Calientes, Entre Lagos, Laguna El Toro, PN Puyehue, Pucatrihue, Puerto Varas, Río Coihueco Termas de Puyehue,); Llanquihue Province (Ensenada, Frutillar, Hornohuinco, Pargua, Puerto Varas); Chiloé Province (Castro, Cucao, Quilán, Hueque Trumao, Punta Tique, Puntra (Ancud), Puntraca, Lago Tarahuen, Lago Tepuhueco, Piuchué); Palena Province (río Caballo Muerto, río Palena, río Ventisquero). Argentina . Neuquén Province (Pucará, Hua-Hum).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : female, Chile ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Chile . Región de Valparaíso : Valparaíso Province (Quintero).
Holotype : female, San Juan (no type specimens deposited in MNNC , presumably lost). Dist.: Chile . Región de Los Ríos : Del Ranco Province (San Juan).

subSubSection.paragraph: Comments: According to original description, Philippi (1865: 725) had a sole specimen female and then it is the holotype ; it was collected by him in his farm (formerly named San Juan and located NW of La Unión).

paragraph.materialsCitation: Holotype : female, Casa Pangue ( NHMUK ). Dist.: Chile . Región de La Araucanía: Malleco Province ( PN Nahuelbuta ); Región de Los Lagos: Llanquihue Province ( Casa Pangue ). Argentina . Río Negro Province ( Bariloche , Cerro Catedral ).
